channel.title: Workstation loads into GURB
channel.description: So I recently installed whonix using the guide for installing on KVM. I removed the sound and blkiotune cause of errors with those. Both gateway and workstation loads into GURB. I tried running the command "normal" but nothing happend. Can anonyone help me?

item.title: Workstation loads into GURB
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Hm. Are you configure it to boot from an external kernel? Perhaps past what your VM config looks like.

Read full topic

item.title: Workstation loads into GURB
item.dc:creator: NotX
item.description:
On the gateway it says “error: file /boot/grub/iXXX-pc/normal.mod not found”

Read full topic
